name: Zombie Exterminator
description:
you can choose from multiple heroes. You wield 4 weapon which each of them has 3 parts body stock and core. Body and stock add unique effect to your weapon and this effects multiply every 3 level. Core determines the gun grenade core throws grenade, assault rifle core fires bullets. You get a weapon part and an upgrade every level.

Features

■ Dozens of heroes which every one of them has different stats.

■ Weapon Customization

■ hundreds of gadgets upgrades and weapons.(tesla gun ,grenade launcher , assault rifle)

■ 3 different game option:

■ survive until time runs out

■ Kill enough zombies

■ Collect sensitive datas which appear on the map


You can make suggestion on https://discord.gg/WYxwCcUaKr.

you can request key for review from huhigamess@gmail.com .
